All Classes and Interfaces

Classes
Class
Description
ApiKeyReader
Utility class to read API key from a properties file.
DailyForecast
Represents a daily weather forecast, including the time of the forecast and a map of forecast values.
DateFormatter
Utility class for formatting date and time strings.
LocationReaderWriter
Handles reading and writing the user's location preference to and from a file.
Timelines
Represents the timelines of weather forecasts, specifically handling daily forecasts.
WeatherApiClient
Client for making API calls to a weather forecasting service.
WeatherCLI
Main class for the command line interface (CLI) version of the Weather application.
WeatherFormatter
This class is responsible for formatting weather data into a human-readable format.
WeatherResponse
Model class to represent a weather response, annotated to ignore unknown JSON properties.
WeatherResponseCache
This class serves as a cache for weather responses to minimize redundant network requests.
